descriptive lists
- [ ] term :: details
          continued details
- [ ] details without a term
- [X] term ::
          details on a new line
- term ::

          details on a new line (with an empty line in between)
          *continued*
          #+BEGIN_SRC bash
          echo "Hello World!"
          #+END_SRC
